full_description:
Edifier W210BT Wireless Neckband Earphone

Edifier W210BT Wireless Neckband Earphone comes with Hi-Res Wireless Certification and LDAC that produce immersive sound. It has an AI call noise cancellation feature. With the W210BT you can play games with ultra-low latency. You can customize EQ settings via the Edifier Connect APP. The Bluetooth 5.3 provides seamless connectivity to the neckband. The Edifier W210BT is IP55-rated dust and waterproof.

Better Sound Effects

Edifier W210BT Neckband Earphone designed with a titanized diaphragm and imported DAIKOKU coil wires, provides highs with more sensitivity and clarity while widening and extending mids and lows. Every beat is vibrant and impassioned during physical activities.

LDAC Audio Codec

Edifier W210BT Neckband Earphone delivers high-definition audio transmission at up to 990 kbps due to the LDAC high-bit-rate high-definition transmission technology. This is roughly three times as much music data that is transmitted by standard codecs. Nearly lossless, high-fidelity acoustic quality creates the impression that the original audio is being reproduced.

Crystal Clear Call Quality

The W210BT Neckband Earphone has an AI call noise cancellation system that intelligently removes background noise during phone calls so that the human voice may be clearly heard. The other party can clearly hear you when you phone them, just as if you were speaking to them face-to-face, even in noisy surroundings.

Built-in Game Sound Effects

The W210BT Wireless Neckband is designed with chip performance and codec optimization that produce a low latency of 80md, which synchronizes sound and image. Special game sound effects also make footsteps and gunfire feel more realistic, which makes playing the game more enjoyable.

This W280BT water resistant Bluetooth earphones also have a unique magnet feature that provides an anti-tangle experience which magnetically attach to each other, forming a necklace around your neck when not in use; style and comfort all in one. In this earphone, the inline controls also come with a microphone so you can talk with your friends and family. This also has a battery meter and sleep functionality for the earphones. It is also equipped with extended flexible wing that is ergonomically designed to give more support and improved stability. If the wings feel uncomfortable, they are removable. Edifier W280NB Wireless Active Noise Cancelling Sports Neckband Earphone

The Edifier W280NB Wireless Sports Neckband Earphone comes with Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) technology that eliminates disruptive and intrusive noises and immerses you in a quieter world. It offers Ambient sound mode. Activate the ambient sound mode and stay alert to your surrounding environment without taking your earbuds off while listening to music or talking to others. Edifier W280NB has up to 80ms low latency with gaming mode, finely-tuned EQ enhances and emphasizes the sound of footsteps, and gunfire for a more immersive playing experience. Edifier W280NB Wireless Sports Neckband features a Type-C charging interface and fast charging. It offers a playback time of up to 13 hours with ANC off and 11 hours with ANC on. The noise-canceling neckband earphone offers IP55 dust and water resistance. It defends against dust and water with nano-coating technology to make headphones durable, and you can keep the music playing come rain or shine. Edifier W280NB comes with a 1-year warranty.
